name: [BOT]any
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam (https://godotwildjam.com/)

Control the little plant and use the robots to solve the puzzles in this puzzle game with solarpunk aesthetics

Controls:
WASD | Arrows - Move and jump
E - Interact with robots
R - Reset level
Space - Start game on main menu

Known bugs:
If you press the button too many times the connected doors function will be reverse
